post.name: Kenneth Khoo
post.body: Hello, my name is Kenneth Khoo. I'm currently an undergraduate computer science student attending Cal Poly Pomona looking to graduate in 2014. I am always looking to expand my knowledge in anything technology. I hope to be able to apply the knowledge and skills from school in the fast-changing technological world we live in.
post.name: Ky Tran
post.body: Hi, my name is Ky Tran. I like working on web based application. In my free time, I like to play games. I also like to bowl and to play pool with the friends. I am hoping this project can expand my knowledge of game development and mobile development.
